document_data.name: Comassur Creek
document_data.mainbody: '''Comassur Creek''' was a small tributary of the [[Amnurflow]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: Comassur Creek was known as a wonderful area for fishing. Salmon spawned there annually.
document_data.Geography: This tiny creek flowed into the Amnurflow five miles northeast of [[Lake Weng]].
